attributes.action: Make it mandatory for MPs to fact check their social media posts
attributes.background: MP Ester McVey shared an inflammatory article about all EU countries being forced to adopt the Euro. This was ‘fake news’. MPs should not be allowed to distribute lies to suit their own political agenda. It is an abuse of their position.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because how MPs use their social media accounts is their responsibility and not that of the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.

You could start a new petition establishing an independent fact checking body for all social media users if that's something you would like to see happen.
